name: drupal-audiofile
description: JavaScript behavior for the MediaRecorder integration.

scripts.dist: yarn run dist:js && yarn run dist:css
scripts.drupal: yarn run dist && cp dist/main.js ../audiofile.min.js && cp dist/main.css ../audiofile.min.css
scripts.lint:css: yarn run stylelint 'src/**/*.scss' && yarn run prettier --check 'src/**/*.scss'
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:js && yarn run lint:css
scripts.fix:css: yarn run stylelint --fix 'src/**/*.scss' && yarn run prettier --write 'src/**/*.scss'
scripts.fix: yarn run fix:js && yarn run fix:css

hooks.pre-commit: yarn run lint-staged && yarn run dist
